text: The Miss Indiana World competition is a beauty pageant that selects the representative for Indiana in the Miss World America pageant.The American representatives to Miss World 1978-1994 The current Miss Indiana World is Jessica Hopper of Remington. == Winners == ;Color key {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" ! width=5% | Year ! width=20%| Name ! width=10%| Hometown ! width=3%|Age
